title: How do I need to fill form I 864 since my wife is not working I am the only one working in the US thru H1b visa
question: My wife is filling form 864 affidavit for sponsor and since she is not working, how can we do to fill form the right way.
answers:
Well, you can put her as homemaker. Your income will be used usually if it is a marriage petition because you are on H1B. It is allowed to use your income for the affidavit of support.

Good Luck
